Questions.question: Pointing to a boy in the photograph, Monika said, “His sister is the only daughter of my father”. How is the boy related to Monika's father?
Introducing a man, a woman said, "He is the son of the only daughter of my mother". How is the man related to the woman?
If A is the brother of B; B is the sister of C; and C is the father of D, how is D related to A?
Pointing to a photograph, a lady tells Pramod, "I am the only daughter of this lady's mother-in-law". How is the lady in the photograph related to Pramod?
If P is the brother of Q, Q is the sister of R, R is the father of S, how is P related to S?
A is the father of C. D is the son of B. E is the brother of A. If C is the sister of D, how is B related to E?
Pointing to a man, a woman said, "His mother is the only daughter of my mother." How is the woman related to the man?

If 'A + B' means 'A is the mother of B', 'A - B' means 'A is the brother of B', 'A % B' means 'A is the father of B' and 'A x B' means 'A is the sister of B', which of the following shows that P is the maternal uncle of Q?
If A is the mother of B, B is the son of C, C is the brother of D, how is D related to A?
Pointing to a woman, Rohit said, "She is the daughter of my grandfather's only son." How is the woman related to Rohit?
P is the father of Q. Q is the sister of R. R is the son of S. How is S related to P?
A is B's sister. C is B's mother. D is C's father. E is D's mother. Then, how is A related to D?
If A is the son of B, C is the daughter of D, E is the mother of F, G is the brother of H. Also, B and D are married, and A is the brother of C. E is the sister of B. How is F related to C?
Anil is the brother of Sunil. Sunil is the son of Ramesh. Ramesh is the father of Gopal. How is Anil related to Gopal?
X is the husband of Y. W is the daughter of X. Z is the husband of W. N is the daughter of Z. What is the relationship of N to Y?
M is the son of P. Q is the granddaughter of O who is the husband of P. How is M related to Q?
Pointing to a lady, a man said, "The son of her only brother is the brother of my wife". How is the lady related to the man?
If A + B means A is the father of B; A - B means A is the mother of B; A x B means A is the brother of B; A % B means A is the sister of B. How is P related to S in P + Q x R - S?
Rahul is brother of Harsh. Diva is sister of Karan. Parul is daughter of Karan and is granddaughter of Harsh. Ankita is wife of Harsh. How is Ankita related to Parul?
A man said to a lady, "Your mother's husband's sister is my aunt." How is the lady related to the man?
A's mother is the only daughter of B's father. How is B related to A?
Pointing to a girl in the photograph, Ramesh said, "Her mother's brother is the only son of my mother's father." How is the girl's mother related to Ramesh?
Soni is the only daughter of Manoj's father. Manoj is the brother of Rekha. How is Rekha related to Soni?
If M is the brother of N; B is the brother of N; C is the father of M; D is the mother of B. Who is the mother of M?
Introducing a boy, a girl said, "He is the son of the daughter of the father of my uncle." How is the boy related to the girl?
Rakesh is the brother of Mohan. Seema is the mother of Mohan. Rekha is the sister of Seema. How is Rekha related to Rakesh?
A is the father of B and C. B is the son of A but C is not the daughter of A. How is C related to A?
Pointing to a man, a woman said, "He is the son of my husband's father's only daughter-in-law." How is the man related to the woman?
If A is the mother of B; B is the sister of C; C is the father of D, how D is related to A?
If P + Q means P is the father of Q; P - Q means P is the mother of Q; P * Q means P is the brother of Q; P / Q means P is the sister of Q. Which of the following means R is the son of S?

A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H are members of a family. A is the father of G. B is the only child of C. C is the wife of E. D is the mother of F. G is the sister of H. F is the daughter of A. There are two married couples in the family. How is H related to D?
If A is the husband of B, C is the mother of D, and A is the father of D. How is B related to C?

In a family, there are six members A, B, C, D, E, F. A and B are a married couple, A being the male member. D is the only son of C, who is the brother of A. E is the sister of D. B is the daughter-in-law of F, whose husband has died. How is F related to A?
Pointing to a person, Anjali said, "He is the only son of my father's mother-in-law's only daughter." How is the person related to Anjali?

If 'P @ Q' means 'P is the mother of Q', 'P # Q' means 'P is the father of Q', 'P $ Q' means 'P is the husband of Q', 'P * Q' means 'P is the son of Q', then which of the following expressions indicates 'A is the daughter of C'?

A family consists of eight members P, Q, R, S, T, U, V, W. Q is the daughter of P. R is the son of Q. S is the brother of R. T is the mother of S. U is the sister of T. V is the brother of U. W is the father of V. How is W related to P?
There are six persons P, Q, R, S, T, U in a family. Q is the wife of P. R is the brother of P. S is the sister of Q. T is the brother of R. U is the daughter of S. How is U related to Q?
Pointing to a man, a lady said, "His mother is the only daughter of my mother-in-law." How is the lady related to the man?
If 'A + B' means 'A is the sister of B', 'A - B' means 'A is the father of B', 'A x B' means 'A is the daughter of B', then which of the following means 'M is the maternal uncle of T'?

In a family of seven persons A, B, C, D, E, F, G, there are two married couples. D is the grandson of F. G is the sister of C. B is the mother of D. E is the wife of B. A is the father of G. How is F related to E?
P, Q, R, S, T, U are six members of a family. R is the spouse of S. P is the father of U. Q is the brother of S. T is the mother of U. Q is the brother of T. How is T related to P?
Pointing to a photograph, a person says, "I have no brother or sister, but that man's father is my father's son." Whose photograph was it?

If 'A @ B' means 'A is the son of B', 'A # B' means 'A is the daughter of B', 'A % B' means 'A is the wife of B', 'A * B' means 'A is the brother of B', then which of the following shows that P is the uncle of S?
A is the father of B. B is the sister of C. C is the mother of D. E is the husband of A. F is the son of C. G is the father of E. H is the wife of G. How is D related to E?

In a family, there are seven persons P, Q, R, S, T, U, V. R is the daughter of P. Q is the brother of R. S is the sister-in-law of R. T is the son of Q. U is the mother of T. V is the father of U. How is P related to U?
A man introduced a boy as the son of the daughter of his father's wife. How is the boy related to the man?

If 'X + Y' means 'X is the husband of Y'; 'X - Y' means 'X is the mother of Y'; 'X * Y' means 'X is the son of Y'; 'X / Y' means 'X is the daughter of Y'. If A * B - C + D, then how is A related to D?

In a certain family, there are two married couples. A is the mother of B. B is the daughter of C. D is the father of E. E is the mother of F. C is the brother of D. How many male members are there in the family?
Pointing to a woman, a man said, "Her father is my father's only son." How is the man related to the woman?
A, B, C, D, E, F are members of a family. There are two married couples. D is the grandfather of F. E is the mother of C. B is the wife of D. A is the brother of E. How is C related to F?
If P + Q means P is the father of Q; P - Q means P is the wife of Q; P x Q means P is the brother of Q; P / Q means P is the daughter of Q. If A / B - C x D, then how is D related to A?

There are eight members A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H in a family. There are three married couples. D is the daughter of A. B is the mother of D. C is the son of B. E is the wife of C. G is the son of E. F is the daughter of H. H is the wife of A. How is G related to D?
Pointing to an old man, Kailash said, "His son is my son's uncle". How is Kailash related to the old man?

In a family of eight persons – A, B, C, D, E, F, G and H – there are three married couples. C is the daughter of G. B is the son of A. E is the wife of B. D is the daughter of F. G is the father of B. H is the wife of G. How is F related to C?
If A is the father of B, B is the sister of C, D is the mother of A, E is the son of D, F is the brother of C. How is F related to E?

P, Q, R, S, T, U are six members of a family in which there are two married couples. T is the daughter of P. U is the mother of Q. S is the mother-in-law of P. R is the brother of T. Q is the father of R. How is S related to Q?

A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H are 8 members of a family. There are 3 married couples. D is the daughter of A. B is the mother of D. C is the son of B. E is the wife of C. G is the son of E. F is the daughter of H. H is the wife of A. How many female members are there in the family?
Pointing to a girl in the picture, Sanjay said, "Her mother's father is my mother's husband." How is the girl in the picture related to Sanjay?
If M is the daughter of N, N is the sister of O, O is the father of P, P is the brother of Q. How is Q related to M?

In a family, A, B, C, D, E, F, G, H are eight members. There are two married couples. F is the father of A. C is the daughter of E. B is the brother of C. H is the mother of G. D is the son-in-law of H. G is the sister of B. How is A related to D?
Pointing to a man, a woman said, "His brother's father is the only son of my grandfather." How is the woman related to the man?

If A + B means A is the father of B; A - B means A is the wife of B; A x B means A is the brother of B; A / B means A is the daughter of B. Which of the following means M is the maternal grandmother of T?
In a family, A is the father of B. B is the sister of C. D is the mother of C. E is the son of D. How is E related to A?
Pointing to a lady in the photograph, Sarita said, "She is the only daughter of my mother's husband's mother." How is the lady related to Sarita?
P is the son of Q. Q is the mother of R. R is the husband of S. S is the daughter of T. How is T related to P?

If 'X + Y' means 'X is the mother of Y', 'X - Y' means 'X is the brother of Y', 'X * Y' means 'X is the father of Y', 'X / Y' means 'X is the sister of Y'. Which of the following means 'R is the niece of P'?
A is the son of B. C is the daughter of A. D is the wife of A. E is the brother of C. F is the mother of B. G is the son of F. How is G related to C?
Pointing to a photograph of a boy, Suresh said, "He is the son of the only son of my mother." How is Suresh related to that boy?
If A is the daughter of B, B is the sister of C, C is the brother of D, D is the mother of E. How is E related to B?
In a family of five, P, Q, R, S, T. P is the mother of Q. Q is the only son. R is the wife of S. S is the brother of Q. T is the father of P. How is R related to T?
A is the sister of B. B is the daughter of C. D is the husband of C. E is the mother of D. F is the daughter of E. How is A related to F?
A man introduced a woman as his "mother's only daughter-in-law's sister-in-law." How is the woman related to the man?
If 'P @ Q' means 'P is the father of Q', 'P # Q' means 'P is the mother of Q', 'P $Q' means 'P is the husband of Q'. How is R related to T in T # S$ R?
A is the father of B. B is the sister of C. D is the brother of C. E is the mother of D. How is E related to A?
Pointing to a man, a lady said, "He is the son of my sister's mother's only son." How is the man related to the lady?
